quoteText: When cancelling your account, we scramble your data in our database so you cannot recover your account and we don't loose your contributions.
title: ToS;DR will continue using anonymized user-generated content even after erasure of personal information

tosdr.case: This service will continue using anonymized user-generated content even after erasure of personal information
tosdr.tldr: ToS;DR's ToS state: "When cancelling your account, we scramble your data in our database so you cannot recover your account and we don't loose your contributions."
